title: King's Bounty Legend ENGLISH - NO CD Patch
description:
This is only the patch for King's Bounty.  Download the Full English version of King's Bounty from: <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4410432/King_s_Bounty_The_Legend_ENG_no_crack" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4410432/King_s_Bounty_The_Legend_ENG_no_crack</a>

as it is the most seeded at this time.

Installation instructions:

1:  Install KB - Legend.  DO NOT start the game yet!!

2:  Copy the 1.6.4 patch from this torrent into the install directory.

3:  Run the 1.6.4 Patch.  Warning:  The patch is in Russian, so you won't be able to read what it's doing.  Don't worry about it.

4:  The patch will come to a point -after a few minutes- where it says something like "???????? ????? ?????? ??????!" (one line of ??? With an exclamation point) unless you have Russian installed on your PC. Now push the button.

5:  Now start the game with the shortcut created or kb.exe from the install dir.  The game will now be v1.6.4 and will play without a CD check!  Enjoy.
